"Hello sunshine...

The earth says hello."

I couldn't resist that reference. Regardless, hello, et cetera and extaecra. I've actually been playing this game for quite a while, I can never thank the devs enough for this fabulous batch of scripting. Regardless, how do I post pictures?

Thank you, devs. And I have never embraced the amazingness that is a new community before.

And yes, my username is an XKCD reference.

Hi SNapple and welcome to the KSP community

You are limited until your 5th post, this is an anti-spam measure, but if you upload your pics to a site like imgur, you can post the link to the pic, and if it's in image tags it'll show on the forums

The regular upload controls are in the Advanced editor, click "Go Advanced" to see it.

Yes. A few of things, however:

1) It's probably best to make sure your images are JPEG's, not PNG. PNG's are a little better quality but they are significantly larger.

2) Rather than URL tags it is possible to use IMG tags. If you do then make sure you have the image URL (it should have .jpg at the end, or in this case .png)

3) If you're going to embed large images, or quote them from somebodies post, then please use spoiler tags as I have below.

This is the code to embed the image within a spoiler (just remove the quotation marks: " ): ["spoiler=Show]["IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bIDps.png[/img"][/spoiler"]

Edited August 11, 2012 by The-Bean
How do I make it a JPEG?

If you're on a Mac, I don't know.

But for Windows you should just be able to rename the file from "filename.png" to filename.jpg". If that doesn't work then you can just open the image in MS Paint > click file > save as > change 'Save as type' to JPEG.

And because I didn't say so: welcome to the forums.
